au, 我有把 cwtex 試出來了
sb-enneve's url: [cwtex-q-fonts - 修正後的 cwTeX TTF 字型 - Google Project Hosting]
但是要把 字型名字改一下

cd /usr/share/fonts/truetype/cwtex/ sudo mv cwTeXQFangsong-Medium.ttf cwTeXQFangsong.ttf sudo mv cwTeXQHei-Bold.ttf cwTeXQHei.ttf sudo mv cwTeXQKai-Medium.ttf cwTeXQKai.ttf sudo mv cwTeXQMing-Medium.ttf cwTeXQMing.ttf sudo mv cwTeXQYuan-Medium.ttf cwTeXQYuan.ttf

$ diff server.ls.ori server.ls.cwtexq  52a53,57 >   return 'cwTeXQMing' if it is /cwming/i >   return 'cwTeXQHei' if it is /cwhei/i >   return 'cwTeXQYuan' if it is /cwyen/i >   return 'cwTeXQKai' if it is /cwkai/i >   return 'cwTeXQFangsong' if it is /cwfs/i 259a265,270 >             optgroup label:'cwTeX', -> >               option value:'?font=cwkai', \楷書 >               option selected:(png-suffix is '.png?font=cwming'), val

cwhei'), value:\?font=cwhei, \黑體 >               option selected:(png-suffix is '.png?font=cwyen'), value:\?font=cwyen, \圓體 >               option selected:(png-suffix is '.png?font=cwfs'), value:\?font=cwfs, \仿宋
